context.p: Once you have synopsys-bridge executable installed, you are ready to use Synopsys Bridge to integrate SAST and/or SCA scans into your CI/CD pipeline. You can run Synopsys Bridge in one of the following two ways:

step.cmd: By passing arguments through a JSON file.
By passing arguments on the command line.
step.info: For a complete list of exit codes returned by Synopsys Bridge, see the Exit Codes table.
